name: @promethean/prompt-optimization
description: Prompt Optimization v2.0 - qwen3:4b-instruct 100k context optimization system

scripts.deployment:metrics: tsx -e "import { deploymentManager } from './src/deployment-manager.js'; const status = deploymentManager.getStatus(); console.log('Metrics:', status.metrics)"
scripts.deployment:phase2: tsx -e "import { deploymentManager } from './src/deployment-manager.js'; deploymentManager.transitionToPhase('gradual', 50).then(() => console.log('Transitioned to Phase 2'))"
scripts.monitoring:start: tsx -e "import { monitoringDashboard } from './src/monitoring-dashboard.js'; monitoringDashboard.initialize().then(() => console.log('Monitoring started'))"

author: Promethean Team
